name: cari.com.my ad removed. ...让所有恼人的广告滚开。
description:
Removed all ad bar in forum.

只看你想要看的内容！

...让所有恼人的广告滚开。

updated: 08 April 2010.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("cari.com.my") 
{

a[href*="ad"] img, *[src*="ad"],
a[href*="banner"] img, *[src*="banner"],
table[width="132"][border="0"],
td [class="altbg2 bottom"],
table [width="135"][ height="25"],
font [color="#000000"],
table [width="140"],
table [border="0"][ width="140"],
font [color="#000000"]~
*{display:none !important}



table [width="760"],
table [width="728"],
table [width="132"],
p [face="simsun,verdana"][color="red"],
table [summary*="Rules"],
img[src*="banner2"],
img[src*="banner"]
{display:none !important}

table[bgcolor="#F3D0D0"],
font[size="2"][color="red"],
marquee[behavior="alternate"],
marquee[scrollamount="3"],
div[id="modarea"][class="s_clear"],
div[class*="ad_pip"][id*="ad_thread"],
div[class*="ad_thread1_0"],
div[class*="popupavatar"],
span[id*="span_press_1"],
div[id*="ad_thread"],
div[id*="ad_thread4_0"],
table [bgcolor="#ffffff"]
{display:none !important}



a[href*="googlesyndication.com"] img, *[src*="googlesyndication.com"],
a[href*="press_release"] img, *[src*="press_release"],
a[href*="icon_ad"] img, *[src*="icon_ad"],
a[href*="innity"] img, *[src*="innity"]
a[href*="http://avp.innity.com/"] img, *[src*="http://avp.innity.com/"],
a[href*="onnet"] img, *[src*="onnet"],
a[href*="banner2"] img, *[src*="banner2"],
a[href*="upfilephoto"] img, *[src*="upfilephoto"]
{display:none !important}
}
